original_title: I like America and America likes Me
overview: In May 1974 Joseph Beuys flew to New York and was taken by ambulance to the site of the performance, a room in the Ren√© Block Gallery at 409 West Broadway. Beuys lay on the ambulance stretcher swathed in felt. He shared this room with a coyote, for eight hours over three days.
title: I like America and America likes Me
